COMMAND.NAME: getselectionends
COMMAND.SUMMARY: Return the start and end positions of the current selection
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Return the start and end positions (in characters) of the current selection in bufferName If there is no selection, the cursor position is reported as both the start, and the end.
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
